20110126030035.000|20110126030037.000|CC1|TRANSITION TO AN AFGHAN LEAD.

20110126030039.000|20110126030055.000|CC1|BRING OUR TROOPS HOME.

20110126030056.000|20110126030057.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP IS UNDER MORE        
20110126030057.000|20110126030100.000|CC1|PRESSURE THAN AT ANY POINT SINCE
20110126030100.000|20110126030101.000|CC1|2001.

20110126030102.000|20110126030105.000|CC1|BEING REMOVED FROM THE BATTLE

20110126030125.000|20110126030135.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]

20110126030147.000|20110126030149.000|CC1|WILL BE DEPLOYED.

20110126030152.000|20110126030154.000|CC1|NUCLEAR MATERIALS ARE BEING

20110126030305.000|20110126030306.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY, HELPING FARMERS

20110126030310.000|20110126030312.000|CC1|AND COMBATTING THE CORRUPTION   
20110126030312.000|20110126030314.000|CC1|THAT CAN ROT A SOCIETY AND ROB  
20110126030314.000|20110126030318.000|CC1|PEOPLE OF OPPORTUNITY.          
20110126030318.000|20110126030319.000|CC1|RECENT EVENTS HAVE SHOWN US THAT
20110126030319.000|20110126030323.000|CC1|WHAT SETS US APART MUST NOT JUST
20110126030323.000|20110126030324.000|CC1|BE OUR POWER.                   
20110126030324.000|20110126030327.000|CC1|IT MUST ALSO BE THE PURPOSE     
20110126030327.000|20110126030330.000|CC1|BEHIND IT.                      
20110126030330.000|20110126030331.000|CC1|IN SOUTH SUDAN, WITH OUR        
20110126030331.000|20110126030333.000|CC1|ASSISTANCE, THE PEOPLE WERE     
20110126030333.000|20110126030335.000|CC1|FINALLY ABLE TO VOTE FOR        
20110126030335.000|20110126030337.000|CC1|INDEPENDENCE AFTER YEARS OF WAR.
20110126030337.000|20110126030342.000|CC1|THOUSANDS LINED UP BEFORE DAWN. 
20110126030342.000|20110126030345.000|CC1|PEOPLE DANCED IN THE STREETS.   
20110126030345.000|20110126030347.000|CC1|ONE MAN WHO LOST FOUR OF HIS    
20110126030347.000|20110126030348.000|CC1|BROTHERS AT WAR SUMMED UP THE   
20110126030348.000|20110126030349.000|CC1|SCENE AROUND HIM.               
20110126030349.000|20110126030351.000|CC1|THIS WAS A BATTLEFIELD FOR MOST 
20110126030351.000|20110126030354.000|CC1|OF MY LIFE, HE SAID.

20110126030903.000|20110126030905.000|CC1|IS A COUNTRY WHERE ANYTHING IS

20110126030905.000|20110126030907.000|CC1|NO MATTER WHO YOU ARE.          
20110126030907.000|20110126030911.000|CC1|NO MATTER WHERE YOU COME FROM.  
20110126030911.000|20110126030914.000|CC1|THAT DREAM IS WHY I CAN STAND

20110126030916.000|20110126030918.000|CC1|THAT DREAM IS WHY A WORKING

20110126030920.000|20110126030932.000|CC1|BEHIND ME.

20110126030934.000|20110126030935.000|CC1|BEGAN BY SWEEPING THE FLOORS OF 
20110126030935.000|20110126030937.000|CC1|HIS FATHER'S CINCINNATI BAR CAN 
20110126030937.000|20110126030938.000|CC1|PRESIDE AS SPEAKER OF THE HOUSE 
20110126030938.000|20110126030947.000|CC1|IN THE GREATEST NATION ON EARTH.
20110126030947.000|20110126030958.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110126030958.000|20110126031001.000|CC1|THAT DREAM, THAT AMERICAN DREAM 
20110126031001.000|20110126031004.000|CC1|IS WHAT DROVE THE ALLEN BROTHERS
20110126031004.000|20110126031006.000|CC1|TO REINVENT THEIR ROOFING       
20110126031006.000|20110126031008.000|CC1|COMPANY FOR A NEW ERA.          
20110126031008.000|20110126031012.000|CC1|IT'S WHAT DROVE THOSE STUDENTS  
20110126031012.000|20110126031014.000|CC1|AT FORSYTHE TECH TO LEARN A NEW 
20110126031014.000|20110126031016.000|CC1|SKILL AND WORK TOWARD THE       
20110126031016.000|20110126031016.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110126031016.000|20110126031019.000|CC1|AND THAT DREAM IS THE STORY OF A
20110126031019.000|20110126031022.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESS OWNER NAMED      
20110126031022.000|20110126031024.000|CC1|BRANDON FISHER.                 
20110126031024.000|20110126031026.000|CC1|BRANDON STARTED A COMPANY IN    
20110126031026.000|20110126031027.000|CC1|BERLIN, PENNSYLVANIA, THAT      
20110126031027.000|20110126031029.000|CC1|SPECIALIZES IN A NEW KIND OF    
20110126031029.000|20110126031032.000|CC1|DRILLING TECHNOLOGY.            
20110126031032.000|20110126031035.000|CC1|AND ONE DAY LAST SUMMER, HE SAW 
20110126031035.000|20110126031038.000|CC1|THE NEWS THAT HALFWAY ACROSS THE
20110126031038.000|20110126031041.000|CC1|WORLD 33 MEN WERE TRAPPED IN A  
20110126031041.000|20110126031043.000|CC1|CHILEAN MINE, AND NO ONE KNEW   
20110126031043.000|20110126031047.000|CC1|HOW TO SAVE THEM.               
20110126031047.000|20110126031048.000|CC1|BUT BRANDON THOUGHT HIS COMPANY 
20110126031048.000|20110126031050.000|CC1|COULD HELP, AND SO HE DESIGNED A
20110126031050.000|20110126031051.000|CC1|RESCUE THAT WOULD COME TO BE    
20110126031051.000|20110126031054.000|CC1|KNOWN AS PLAN B.                
20110126031054.000|20110126031055.000|CC1|HIS EMPLOYEES WORKED AROUND THE 
20110126031055.000|20110126031057.000|CC1|CLOCK TO MANUFACTURE THE        
20110126031057.000|20110126031058.000|CC1|NECESSARY DRILLING EQUIPMENT.   
20110126031058.000|20110126031102.000|CC1|AND BRANDON LEFT FOR CHILE.     
20110126031102.000|20110126031104.000|CC1|ALONG WITH OTHERS, HE BEGAN     
20110126031104.000|20110126031106.000|CC1|DRILLING A 2,000-FOOT HOLE INTO 
20110126031106.000|20110126031110.000|CC1|THE GROUND, WORKING THREE OR    
20110126031110.000|20110126031114.000|CC1|FOUR DAYS AT A TIME WITHOUT ANY 
20110126031114.000|20110126031114.000|CC1|SLEEP.                          
20110126031114.000|20110126031117.000|CC1|37 DAYS LATER, PLAN B SUCCEEDED.
20110126031117.000|20110126031123.000|CC1|AND THE MINERS WERE RESCUED.    
20110126031123.000|20110126031130.000|CC1|[ APPLAUSE ]                    
20110126031130.000|20110126031131.000|CC1|BUT BECAUSE HE DIDN'T WANT ALL  
20110126031131.000|20110126031132.000|CC1|THE ATTENTION, BRANDON WASN'T   
20110126031132.000|20110126031135.000|CC1|THERE WHEN THE MINERS EMERGED.  
20110126031135.000|20110126031137.000|CC1|HE HAD ALREADY GONE BACK HOME.  
20110126031137.000|20110126031140.000|CC1|BACK TO WORK ON HIS NEXT        
20110126031140.000|20110126031141.000|CC1|PROJECT.                        
20110126031141.000|20110126031142.000|CC1|AND LATER ONE OF HIS EMPLOYEES  
20110126031142.000|20110126031148.000|CC1|SAID OF THE RESCUE, WE PROVED   
20110126031148.000|20110126031149.000|CC1|THAT CENTER ROCK IS A LITTLE    
20110126031149.000|20110126031200.000|CC1|COMPANY, BUT WE DO BIG THINGS.

20110126032524.000|20110126032526.000|CC1|I'M CONGRESSMAN PAUL RYAN FROM

20110126032528.000|20110126032529.000|CC1|BUDGET COMMITTEE.               
20110126032529.000|20110126032531.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA JUST ADDRESSED A
20110126032531.000|20110126032532.000|CC1|CONGRESSIONAL CHAMBER FILLED    
20110126032532.000|20110126032534.000|CC1|WITH MANY NEW FACES.            
20110126032534.000|20110126032536.000|CC1|ONE FACE WE DID NOT SEE TONIGHT 
20110126032536.000|20110126032538.000|CC1|WAS THAT OF OUR FRIEND AND      
20110126032538.000|20110126032539.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE CONGRESSWOMAN

20110126033328.000|20110126033330.000|CC1|WORKED AND IT WON'T WORK NOW.

20110126034858.000|20110126034859.000|CC1|PRESIDENT'S SPEECH AS A SPEECH?
